00037 #include "IdealWeightInverseMeanRatio.hpp"

00049 
00050 IdealWeightInverseMeanRatio::IdealWeightInverseMeanRatio(MsqError& err, double pow_dbl)
00051   : AveragingQM(QualityMetric::LINEAR)
00052 {
00053   set_metric_power(pow_dbl, err);  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00054 }
00055 
00056 IdealWeightInverseMeanRatio::IdealWeightInverseMeanRatio( )
00057   : AveragingQM(QualityMetric::LINEAR)
00058 {
00059   MsqError err;
00060   set_metric_power(1.0, err);
00061   assert(!err);
00062 }
00063 
00064 std::string IdealWeightInverseMeanRatio::get_name() const
00065   { return "Inverse Mean Ratio"; }
00066 
00067 int IdealWeightInverseMeanRatio::get_negate_flag() const
00068   { return b2Con.value() < 0 ? -1 : 1; }
00069 
00071 void IdealWeightInverseMeanRatio::set_metric_power(double pow_dbl, MsqError& err)
00072 {
00073   if(fabs(pow_dbl)<=MSQ_MIN){
00074     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00075     return;
00076   }
00077   a2Con=pow(.5,pow_dbl);
00078   b2Con=pow_dbl;
00079   c2Con=-pow_dbl;
00080   a3Con=pow(1.0/3.0,pow_dbl);
00081   b3Con=pow_dbl;
00082   c3Con=-2.0*pow_dbl/3.0;
00083 }
00084 
00085 bool IdealWeightInverseMeanRatio::evaluate( PatchData& pd, 
00086                                      size_t handle, 
00087                                      double& m, 
00088                                      MsqError& err )
00089 {
00090   const MsqMeshEntity* e = &pd.element_by_index(handle);
00091   EntityTopology topo = e->get_element_type();
00092 
00093   const MsqVertex *vertices = pd.get_vertex_array(err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00094   const size_t *v_i = e->get_vertex_index_array();
00095 
00096   Vector3D n;                   // Surface normal for 2D objects
00097 
00098   // Prism and Hex element descriptions
00099   static const int locs_pri[6][4] = {{0, 1, 2, 3}, {1, 2, 0, 4},
00100                                      {2, 0, 1, 5}, {3, 5, 4, 0},
00101                                      {4, 3, 5, 1}, {5, 4, 3, 2}};
00102   static const int locs_hex[8][4] = {{0, 1, 3, 4}, {1, 2, 0, 5},
00103                                      {2, 3, 1, 6}, {3, 0, 2, 7},
00104                                      {4, 7, 5, 0}, {5, 4, 6, 1},
00105                                      {6, 5, 7, 2}, {7, 6, 4, 3}};
00106 
00107   const Vector3D d_con(1.0, 1.0, 1.0);
00108 
00109   int i;
00110 
00111   m = 0.0;
00112   bool metric_valid = false;
00113   switch(topo) {
00114   case TRIANGLE:
00115     pd.get_domain_normal_at_element(e, n, err); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00116     n = n / n.length();         // Need unit normal
00117     mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[0]];
00118     mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[1]];
00119     mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[2]];
00120     metric_valid = m_fcn_2e(m, mCoords, n, a2Con, b2Con, c2Con);
00121     if (!metric_valid) return false;
00122     break;
00123     
00124   case QUADRILATERAL:
00125     pd.get_domain_normal_at_element(e, n, err); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00126     n = n / n.length(); // Need unit normal
00127     for (i = 0; i < 4; ++i) {
00128       mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][0]]];
00129       mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][1]]];
00130       mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][2]]];
00131       metric_valid = m_fcn_2i(mMetrics[i], mCoords, n, 
00132                               a2Con, b2Con, c2Con, d_con);
00133       if (!metric_valid) return false;
00134     }
00135     m = average_metrics(mMetrics, 4, err);
00136     break;
00137 
00138   case TETRAHEDRON:
00139     mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[0]];
00140     mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[1]];
00141     mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[2]];
00142     mCoords[3] = vertices[v_i[3]];
00143     metric_valid = m_fcn_3e(m, mCoords, a3Con, b3Con, c3Con);
00144     if (!metric_valid) return false;
00145     break;
00146 
00147   case PYRAMID:
00148     for (i = 0; i < 4; ++i) {
00149       mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[ i     ]];
00150       mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[(i+1)%4]];
00151       mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[(i+3)%4]];
00152       mCoords[3] = vertices[v_i[ 4     ]];
00153       metric_valid = m_fcn_3p(mMetrics[i], mCoords, a3Con, b3Con, c3Con);
00154       if (!metric_valid) return false;
00155     }
00156     m = average_metrics(mMetrics, 4, err); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00157     break;
00158 
00159   case PRISM:
00160     for (i = 0; i < 6; ++i) {
00161       mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[locs_pri[i][0]]];
00162       mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[locs_pri[i][1]]];
00163       mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[locs_pri[i][2]]];
00164       mCoords[3] = vertices[v_i[locs_pri[i][3]]];
00165       metric_valid = m_fcn_3w(mMetrics[i], mCoords, a3Con, b3Con, c3Con);
00166       if (!metric_valid) return false;
00167     }
00168     m = average_metrics(mMetrics, 6, err); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00169     break;
00170 
00171   case HEXAHEDRON:
00172     for (i = 0; i < 8; ++i) {
00173       mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][0]]];
00174       mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][1]]];
00175       mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][2]]];
00176       mCoords[3] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][3]]];
00177       metric_valid = m_fcn_3i(mMetrics[i], mCoords, 
00178                               a3Con, b3Con, c3Con, d_con);
00179       if (!metric_valid) return false;
00180     }
00181     m = average_metrics(mMetrics, 8, err); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00182     break;
00183 
00184   default:
00185     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT,
00186                     "Element type (%d) not supported in IdealWeightInverseMeanRatio",
00187                     (int)topo);
00188     return false;
00189   } // end switch over element type
00190   return true;
00191 }
00192 
00193 bool IdealWeightInverseMeanRatio::evaluate_with_gradient( PatchData& pd,
00194                     size_t handle,
00195                     double& m,
00196                     std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00197                     std::vector<Vector3D>& g,
00198                     MsqError& err )
00199 {
00200   const MsqMeshEntity* e = &pd.element_by_index(handle);
00201   EntityTopology topo = e->get_element_type();
00202 
00203   if (!analytical_average_gradient() &&
00204       topo != TRIANGLE &&
00205       topo != TETRAHEDRON) {
00206     static bool print = true;
00207     if (print) {
00208       MSQ_DBGOUT(1) << "Analyical gradient not available for selected averaging scheme. "
00209                     << "Using (possibly much slower) numerical approximation of gradient"
00210                     << " of quality metric. " << std::endl;
00211       print = false;
00212     }
00213     return QualityMetric::evaluate_with_gradient( pd, handle, m, indices, g, err );
00214   }
00215 
00216   const MsqVertex *vertices = pd.get_vertex_array(err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00217   const size_t *v_i = e->get_vertex_index_array();
00218 
00219   Vector3D n;                   // Surface normal for 2D objects
00220 
00221   // Prism and Hex element descriptions
00222   static const int locs_pri[6][4] = {{0, 1, 2, 3}, {1, 2, 0, 4},
00223                                      {2, 0, 1, 5}, {3, 5, 4, 0},
00224                                      {4, 3, 5, 1}, {5, 4, 3, 2}};
00225   static const int locs_hex[8][4] = {{0, 1, 3, 4}, {1, 2, 0, 5},
00226                                      {2, 3, 1, 6}, {3, 0, 2, 7},
00227                                      {4, 7, 5, 0}, {5, 4, 6, 1},
00228                                      {6, 5, 7, 2}, {7, 6, 4, 3}};
00229 
00230   const Vector3D d_con(1.0, 1.0, 1.0);
00231 
00232   int i;
00233 
00234   bool metric_valid = false;
00235   const uint32_t fm = fixed_vertex_bitmap( pd, e, indices );
00236 
00237   m = 0.0;
00238 
00239   switch(topo) {
00240   case TRIANGLE:
00241     pd.get_domain_normal_at_element(e, n, err); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00242     n /= n.length();            // Need unit normal
00243     mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[0]];
00244     mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[1]];
00245     mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[2]];
00246     g.resize(3);
00247     if (!g_fcn_2e(m, arrptr(g), mCoords, n, a2Con, b2Con, c2Con)) return false;
00248     break;
00249 
00250   case QUADRILATERAL:
00251     pd.get_domain_normal_at_element(e, n, err); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00252     n /= n.length();    // Need unit normal
00253     for (i = 0; i < 4; ++i) {
00254       mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][0]]];
00255       mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][1]]];
00256       mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][2]]];
00257       if (!g_fcn_2i(mMetrics[i], mGradients+3*i, mCoords, n,
00258                     a2Con, b2Con, c2Con, d_con)) return false;
00259     }
00260 
00261     g.resize(4);
00262     m = average_corner_gradients( QUADRILATERAL, fm, 4,
00263                                   mMetrics, mGradients,
00264                                   arrptr(g), err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00265     break;
00266 
00267   case TETRAHEDRON:
00268     mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[0]];
00269     mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[1]];
00270     mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[2]];
00271     mCoords[3] = vertices[v_i[3]];
00272     g.resize(4);
00273     metric_valid = g_fcn_3e(m, arrptr(g), mCoords, a3Con, b3Con, c3Con);
00274     if (!metric_valid) return false;
00275     break;
00276 
00277   case PYRAMID:
00278     for (i = 0; i < 4; ++i) {
00279       mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[ i     ]];
00280       mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[(i+1)%4]];
00281       mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[(i+3)%4]];
00282       mCoords[3] = vertices[v_i[ 4     ]];
00283       metric_valid = g_fcn_3p(mMetrics[i], mGradients+4*i, mCoords, a3Con, b3Con, c3Con);
00284       if (!metric_valid) return false;
00285     }
00286 
00287     g.resize(5);
00288     m = average_corner_gradients( PYRAMID, fm, 4,
00289                                   mMetrics, mGradients,
00290                                   arrptr(g), err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00291     break;
00292 
00293   case PRISM:
00294     for (i = 0; i < 6; ++i) {
00295       mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[locs_pri[i][0]]];
00296       mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[locs_pri[i][1]]];
00297       mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[locs_pri[i][2]]];
00298       mCoords[3] = vertices[v_i[locs_pri[i][3]]];
00299       if (!g_fcn_3w(mMetrics[i], mGradients+4*i, mCoords, 
00300                     a3Con, b3Con, c3Con)) return false;
00301     }
00302     
00303     g.resize(6);
00304     m = average_corner_gradients( PRISM, fm, 6,
00305                                   mMetrics, mGradients,
00306                                   arrptr(g), err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00307     break;
00308 
00309   case HEXAHEDRON:
00310     for (i = 0; i < 8; ++i) {
00311       mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][0]]];
00312       mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][1]]];
00313       mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][2]]];
00314       mCoords[3] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][3]]];
00315       if (!g_fcn_3i(mMetrics[i], mGradients+4*i, mCoords, 
00316                     a3Con, b3Con, c3Con, d_con)) return false;
00317     }
00318 
00319     g.resize(8);
00320     m = average_corner_gradients( HEXAHEDRON, fm, 8,
00321                                   mMetrics, mGradients,
00322                                   arrptr(g), err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00323     break;
00324 
00325   default:
00326     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT,
00327                     "Element type (%d) not supported in IdealWeightInverseMeanRatio",
00328                     (int)topo);
00329     return false;
00330   } // end switch over element type
00331 
00332   remove_fixed_gradients( topo, fm, g );
00333   return true;
00334 }

00336 
00337 bool IdealWeightInverseMeanRatio::evaluate_with_Hessian_diagonal( PatchData& pd,
00338                     size_t handle,
00339                     double& m,
00340                     std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00341                     std::vector<Vector3D>& g,
00342                     std::vector<SymMatrix3D>& h,
00343                     MsqError& err )
00344 {
00345   const MsqMeshEntity* e = &pd.element_by_index(handle);
00346   EntityTopology topo = e->get_element_type();
00347 
00348   if (!analytical_average_hessian() &&
00349       topo != TRIANGLE &&
00350       topo != TETRAHEDRON) {
00351     static bool print = true;
00352     if (print) {
00353       MSQ_DBGOUT(1) << "Analyical gradient not available for selected averaging scheme. "
00354                     << "Using (possibly much slower) numerical approximation of gradient"
00355                     << " of quality metric. " << std::endl;
00356       print = false;
00357     }
00358     return QualityMetric::evaluate_with_Hessian_diagonal( pd, handle, m, indices, g, h, err );
00359   }
00360 
00361   const MsqVertex *vertices = pd.get_vertex_array(err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00362   const size_t *v_i = e->get_vertex_index_array();
00363 
00364 
00365   Vector3D n;                   // Surface normal for 2D objects
00366 
00367   // Prism and Hex element descriptions
00368   static const int locs_pri[6][4] = {{0, 1, 2, 3}, {1, 2, 0, 4},
00369                                      {2, 0, 1, 5}, {3, 5, 4, 0},
00370                                      {4, 3, 5, 1}, {5, 4, 3, 2}};
00371   static const int locs_hex[8][4] = {{0, 1, 3, 4}, {1, 2, 0, 5},
00372                                      {2, 3, 1, 6}, {3, 0, 2, 7},
00373                                      {4, 7, 5, 0}, {5, 4, 6, 1},
00374                                      {6, 5, 7, 2}, {7, 6, 4, 3}};
00375 
00376   const Vector3D d_con(1.0, 1.0, 1.0);
00377 
00378   int i;
00379 
00380   bool metric_valid = false;
00381   const uint32_t fm = fixed_vertex_bitmap( pd, e, indices );
00382 
00383   m = 0.0;
00384 
00385   switch(topo) {
00386   case TRIANGLE:
00387     pd.get_domain_normal_at_element(e, n, err); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00388     n /= n.length();            // Need unit normal
00389     mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[0]];
00390     mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[1]];
00391     mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[2]];
00392     g.resize(3); h.resize(3);
00393     if (!h_fcn_2e(m, arrptr(g), mHessians, mCoords, n, a2Con, b2Con, c2Con)) return false;
00394     h[0] = mHessians[0].upper();
00395     h[1] = mHessians[3].upper();
00396     h[2] = mHessians[5].upper();
00397     break;
00398 
00399   case QUADRILATERAL:
00400     pd.get_domain_normal_at_element(e, n, err); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00401     n /= n.length();    // Need unit normal
00402     for (i = 0; i < 4; ++i) {
00403       mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][0]]];
00404       mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][1]]];
00405       mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][2]]];
00406       if (!h_fcn_2i(mMetrics[i], mGradients+3*i, mHessians+6*i, mCoords, n,
00407                     a2Con, b2Con, c2Con, d_con)) return false;
00408     }
00409 
00410     g.resize(4); h.resize(4);
00411     m = average_corner_hessian_diagonals( QUADRILATERAL, fm, 4,
00412                                  mMetrics, mGradients, mHessians,
00413                                  arrptr(g), arrptr(h), err );
00414     MSQ_ERRZERO( err );
00415     break;
00416 
00417   case TETRAHEDRON:
00418     mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[0]];
00419     mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[1]];
00420     mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[2]];
00421     mCoords[3] = vertices[v_i[3]];
00422     g.resize(4); h.resize(4);
00423     metric_valid = h_fcn_3e(m, arrptr(g), mHessians, mCoords, a3Con, b3Con, c3Con);
00424     if (!metric_valid) return false;
00425     h[0] = mHessians[0].upper();
00426     h[1] = mHessians[4].upper();
00427     h[2] = mHessians[7].upper();
00428     h[3] = mHessians[9].upper();
00429     break;
00430 
00431   case PYRAMID:
00432     for (i = 0; i < 4; ++i) {
00433       mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[ i     ]];
00434       mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[(i+1)%4]];
00435       mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[(i+3)%4]];
00436       mCoords[3] = vertices[v_i[ 4     ]];
00437       metric_valid = h_fcn_3p(mMetrics[i], mGradients+4*i, 
00438                               mHessians+10*i, mCoords, a3Con, b3Con, c3Con);
00439 
00440       if (!metric_valid) return false;
00441     }
00442 
00443     g.resize(5); h.resize(5);
00444     m = average_corner_hessian_diagonals( PYRAMID, fm, 4,
00445                                  mMetrics, mGradients, mHessians,
00446                                  arrptr(g), arrptr(h), err );
00447     MSQ_ERRZERO( err );
00448     break;
00449 
00450   case PRISM:
00451     for (i = 0; i < 6; ++i) {
00452       mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[locs_pri[i][0]]];
00453       mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[locs_pri[i][1]]];
00454       mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[locs_pri[i][2]]];
00455       mCoords[3] = vertices[v_i[locs_pri[i][3]]];
00456       if (!h_fcn_3w(mMetrics[i], mGradients+4*i, mHessians+10*i, mCoords,
00457                     a3Con, b3Con, c3Con)) return false;
00458     }
00459 
00460     g.resize(6); h.resize(6);
00461     m = average_corner_hessian_diagonals( PRISM, fm, 6,
00462                                  mMetrics, mGradients, mHessians,
00463                                  arrptr(g), arrptr(h), err );
00464     MSQ_ERRZERO( err );
00465     break;
00466 
00467   case HEXAHEDRON:
00468     for (i = 0; i < 8; ++i) {
00469       mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][0]]];
00470       mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][1]]];
00471       mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][2]]];
00472       mCoords[3] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][3]]];
00473       if (!h_fcn_3i(mMetrics[i], mGradients+4*i, mHessians+10*i, mCoords,
00474                     a3Con, b3Con, c3Con, d_con)) return false;
00475     }
00476 
00477     g.resize(8); h.resize(8);
00478     m = average_corner_hessian_diagonals( HEXAHEDRON, fm, 8,
00479                                  mMetrics, mGradients, mHessians,
00480                                  arrptr(g), arrptr(h), err );
00481     MSQ_ERRZERO( err );
00482     break;
00483 
00484   default:
00485     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT,
00486                     "Element type (%d) not supported in IdealWeightInverseMeanRatio",
00487                     (int)topo);
00488     return false;
00489   } // end switch over element type
00490 
00491   remove_fixed_diagonals( topo, fm, g, h );
00492   return true;
00493 }
00494 
00495 bool IdealWeightInverseMeanRatio::evaluate_with_Hessian( PatchData& pd,
00496                     size_t handle,
00497                     double& m,
00498                     std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00499                     std::vector<Vector3D>& g,
00500                     std::vector<Matrix3D>& h,
00501                     MsqError& err )
00502 {
00503   const MsqMeshEntity* e = &pd.element_by_index(handle);
00504   EntityTopology topo = e->get_element_type();
00505 
00506   if (!analytical_average_hessian() &&
00507       topo != TRIANGLE &&
00508       topo != TETRAHEDRON) {
00509     static bool print = true;
00510     if (print) {
00511       MSQ_DBGOUT(1) << "Analyical gradient not available for selected averaging scheme. "
00512                     << "Using (possibly much slower) numerical approximation of gradient"
00513                     << " of quality metric. " << std::endl;
00514       print = false;
00515     }
00516     return QualityMetric::evaluate_with_Hessian( pd, handle, m, indices, g, h, err );
00517   }
00518 
00519   const MsqVertex *vertices = pd.get_vertex_array(err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00520   const size_t *v_i = e->get_vertex_index_array();
00521 
00522 
00523   Vector3D n;                   // Surface normal for 2D objects
00524 
00525   // Prism and Hex element descriptions
00526   static const int locs_pri[6][4] = {{0, 1, 2, 3}, {1, 2, 0, 4},
00527                                      {2, 0, 1, 5}, {3, 5, 4, 0},
00528                                      {4, 3, 5, 1}, {5, 4, 3, 2}};
00529   static const int locs_hex[8][4] = {{0, 1, 3, 4}, {1, 2, 0, 5},
00530                                      {2, 3, 1, 6}, {3, 0, 2, 7},
00531                                      {4, 7, 5, 0}, {5, 4, 6, 1},
00532                                      {6, 5, 7, 2}, {7, 6, 4, 3}};
00533 
00534   const Vector3D d_con(1.0, 1.0, 1.0);
00535 
00536   int i;
00537 
00538   bool metric_valid = false;
00539   const uint32_t fm = fixed_vertex_bitmap( pd, e, indices );
00540 
00541   m = 0.0;
00542 
00543   switch(topo) {
00544   case TRIANGLE:
00545     pd.get_domain_normal_at_element(e, n, err); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00546     n /= n.length();            // Need unit normal
00547     mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[0]];
00548     mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[1]];
00549     mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[2]];
00550     g.resize(3); h.resize(6);
00551     if (!h_fcn_2e(m, arrptr(g), arrptr(h), mCoords, n, a2Con, b2Con, c2Con)) return false;
00552     break;
00553 
00554   case QUADRILATERAL:
00555     pd.get_domain_normal_at_element(e, n, err); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00556     n /= n.length();    // Need unit normal
00557     for (i = 0; i < 4; ++i) {
00558       mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][0]]];
00559       mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][1]]];
00560       mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][2]]];
00561       if (!h_fcn_2i(mMetrics[i], mGradients+3*i, mHessians+6*i, mCoords, n,
00562                     a2Con, b2Con, c2Con, d_con)) return false;
00563     }
00564 
00565     g.resize(4); h.resize(10);
00566     m = average_corner_hessians( QUADRILATERAL, fm, 4,
00567                                  mMetrics, mGradients, mHessians,
00568                                  arrptr(g), arrptr(h), err );
00569     MSQ_ERRZERO( err );
00570     break;
00571 
00572   case TETRAHEDRON:
00573     mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[0]];
00574     mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[1]];
00575     mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[2]];
00576     mCoords[3] = vertices[v_i[3]];
00577     g.resize(4); h.resize(10);
00578     metric_valid = h_fcn_3e(m, arrptr(g), arrptr(h), mCoords, a3Con, b3Con, c3Con);
00579     if (!metric_valid) return false;
00580     break;
00581 
00582   case PYRAMID:
00583     for (i = 0; i < 4; ++i) {
00584       mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[ i     ]];
00585       mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[(i+1)%4]];
00586       mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[(i+3)%4]];
00587       mCoords[3] = vertices[v_i[ 4     ]];
00588       metric_valid = h_fcn_3p(mMetrics[i], mGradients+4*i, 
00589                               mHessians+10*i, mCoords, a3Con, b3Con, c3Con);
00590 
00591       if (!metric_valid) return false;
00592     }
00593 
00594     g.resize(5); h.resize(15);
00595     m = average_corner_hessians( PYRAMID, fm, 4,
00596                                  mMetrics, mGradients, mHessians,
00597                                  arrptr(g), arrptr(h), err );
00598     MSQ_ERRZERO( err );
00599     break;
00600 
00601   case PRISM:
00602     for (i = 0; i < 6; ++i) {
00603       mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[locs_pri[i][0]]];
00604       mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[locs_pri[i][1]]];
00605       mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[locs_pri[i][2]]];
00606       mCoords[3] = vertices[v_i[locs_pri[i][3]]];
00607       if (!h_fcn_3w(mMetrics[i], mGradients+4*i, mHessians+10*i, mCoords,
00608                     a3Con, b3Con, c3Con)) return false;
00609     }
00610 
00611     g.resize(6); h.resize(21);
00612     m = average_corner_hessians( PRISM, fm, 6,
00613                                  mMetrics, mGradients, mHessians,
00614                                  arrptr(g), arrptr(h), err );
00615     MSQ_ERRZERO( err );
00616     break;
00617 
00618   case HEXAHEDRON:
00619     for (i = 0; i < 8; ++i) {
00620       mCoords[0] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][0]]];
00621       mCoords[1] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][1]]];
00622       mCoords[2] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][2]]];
00623       mCoords[3] = vertices[v_i[locs_hex[i][3]]];
00624       if (!h_fcn_3i(mMetrics[i], mGradients+4*i, mHessians+10*i, mCoords,
00625                     a3Con, b3Con, c3Con, d_con)) return false;
00626     }
00627 
00628     g.resize(8); h.resize(36);
00629     m = average_corner_hessians( HEXAHEDRON, fm, 8,
00630                                  mMetrics, mGradients, mHessians,
00631                                  arrptr(g), arrptr(h), err );
00632     MSQ_ERRZERO( err );
00633     break;
00634 
00635   default:
00636     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT,
00637                     "Element type (%d) not supported in IdealWeightInverseMeanRatio",
00638                     (int)topo);
00639     return false;
00640   } // end switch over element type
00641 
00642   remove_fixed_gradients( topo, fm, g );
00643   remove_fixed_hessians( topo, fm, h );
00644   return true;
00645 }
00646 
00647 } // namespace Mesquite
Generated on Thu May 17 15:57:12 2012 for MESQUITE by  1.4.7
